item.name: Home
item.description: The question I get asked the most is “Where did you get that PAN???” And of course, the “pan” is the tomagoyaki pan I use to make my Gyerranmari or Korean omelet. It’s non-stick, which is a MUST when making this dish and the rectangular shape keeps things really tidy. The truth is, though, that […]
